string.text: That loot is mine! Back off!
Hey, that loot is mine! Get away from him!
Back away from him, that loot is mine!
Don't even think about it, that guy's stuff is mine.
Hands off, that loot is mine.
That guy's stuff belongs to us! Leave it alone.
I won't warn you again, stay away from that loot!
This is the last time I'm gonna tell you to stay away from that body! Leave it.
I'm warning you, if you try to steal that loot, we'll open fire.
Last chance - leave that loot alone.
Last warning! Don't touch that body, or we will shoot!
We warned you! We aren't gonna let you steal from us!
He's trying to steal our loot! Open fire!
Hey, he's trying to take our stuff! Get him!
You're not gonna steal from us and get away with it!
You found nothing useful on this dead body.
